messages.subject: The Japanese Sword at the V&A
messages.msgSnippet: There is a Saturday in February 2002 when there will be a day on the subject of the Japanese Sword at the Victoria and Albert Museum in London. Talks include
messages.messageBody:
There is a Saturday in February 2002 when there will be a day on the
subject of the Japanese Sword at the Victoria and Albert Museum
in London.

Talks include making and collection, and a tour of the museum's
collection, plus demonstrations of Kendo, Iaido and Kyudo.

If anyone's interested I'll post details.

Thomas
